channel.title: CVE Feed for Brainstorm Force -- Ultimate Addons for WPBakery
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Brainstorm Force -- Ultimate Addons for WPBakery

item.title: CVE-2024-5251|2024-07-17T06:45:12.041Z -- brainstorm%20force -- ultimate%20addons%20for%20wpbakery
item.description: The Ultimate Addons for WPBakery plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's ultimate_pricing shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 3.19.20 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
